attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Honorable Respected Prime Minister of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Mr Gordon Brown

Dear Prime Minister

Seasons Greetings and Best Wishes, Trust all is well.

I would wish to take this opportunity to submit a humble request which is having one agenda

This is:-

"To Inspire The World"

I sincerely hope and wish you will take initiatives  and encourage endeavors associated with the above

Obviously so many steps are being taken enterprisingly and wisely, this is an additional request submitted and hope that it will be considered please

The opportunity to submit this petition is certainly appreciated and I and would like to thank you for your kind attention

Respectfully, 

With Admiration,

Vashi Ram Chandi

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
